main event: An observation of a bright white oval object with a tail extending toward the horizon, which did not move or change during the sighting.
interesting points: The object was observed approximately 600 miles off the U.S. Atlantic 1st Station., The object had a white beam extending toward the horizon., The sighting lasted for a duration of 10 minutes., The object disappeared into space after being observed for some time., Observers noted that it was larger than a jet when viewed.
sighted object: bright white oval object with a tail
witness description: a pilot from the 15th Air Transport Squadron
